description: added pm, added more section markers
title: Mercyful Fate

description:
2 years later, the drums are completely fixed and readable! Yay!

I fixed tempos as best I could. This song seems to fluctuate from measure-to-measure in some parts. All tempos are within 1-2 bpm of the recording for the section.

Added in the missing notes/measures:
- 2 eighth notes in m.26
- 16 measures at m.243
- 2 at m.257
- 1 at m.304

I also changed the random 3/4 measure near the end to a 4/4, fixed the parts to line up properly, and removed the long, 8-measure hold on the solo's final note.

I also changed that random 2-note fret climb in measure 356 (old measure, now measure 386) for bass.
title: Mercyful Fate
